resources.string: You are not authorized to use the camera right. You cannot turn on scanning.
contents have been copied and can be pasted
You are not authorized to read and write storage space and will not be able to get the image resource

Modify the API version of the scanned camera component. The new version may not be better. By default using the new API, you can choose an API version that is more suitable for your device. After the selection, the application will be closed and will take effect after restart.

Are you sure you want to save the current QR code? You can decide to save the width (height) of the picture for the last time, but please note that when you change the width, it will regenerate the QR code, which may consume a lot of time again.
The picture has been saved in %1$s. Is the folder open?
can not find the background image
Please try to select the background image again
